       <div class="health_topic_content_inner_wrap clearfix"> 
        <div class="pageTitle"> 
         <h1 class="syndicate"> Quitting Smoking: Conversation starters </h1> 
         <img id="content_contentImage" class="icon-image" alt="Quitting Smoking: Conversation starters" src="/HealthTopics/glmedia/tools_icons/quittingsmokingconversationstarters.jpg"> 
        </div> 
        <div class="content-page-box clearfix"> 
         <div class="quickguide_tool_content syndicate"> 
          <div class="entry-content-top"> 
           <p>Most smokers want to quit.&nbsp;Support from a family member or friend can make all the difference. Use these tips to start a conversation about quitting smoking.</p> 
          </div> 
          <div class="entry-content-main"> 
           <h2>Be positive.</h2>
           <ul>
            <li>“You are important to me. I want you to live a long, healthy life.”</li>
            <li>“Your body will start to heal&nbsp;right away.”</li>
            <li>“After a few months, you’ll breathe easier and have more energy.”</li>
            <li>“Food and drinks will start to taste better!”</li>
            <li>“Think about how much money you’ll save.”</li>
           </ul>
           <h2>Share steps for quitting.</h2>
           <ul>
            <li>“Write down your reasons for quitting. Keep the list where you’ll see it often.”</li>
            <li>“Set a date to quit. Give yourself up to 2 weeks to make a quit plan.”</li>
            <li>“Talk to your doctor about counseling, medicines, and other resources that can help you quit.”</li>
            <li>“Call 1-800-QUIT-NOW (1-800-784-8669) for free support and coaching to help you quit.”</li>
            <li>“Throw away your cigarettes, lighters, and ashtrays – at home, in the car, and at work.”</li>
            <li>"Visit <a href="http://smokefree.gov/" onclick="HFPopUpWin('http://smokefree.gov/');return false;" target="_blank">Smokefree.gov</a> for more quit tips and tools."</li>
           </ul>
           <h2>Offer support.</h2>
           <ul>
            <li>“I'm so proud of you for trying to quit. How can&nbsp;I help you?”</li>
            <li>“I promise to understand if quitting makes you cranky or anxious.”</li>
            <li>“Quitting is tough. If you slip up, I can help you get back on track.”</li>
            <li>“Let’s do something relaxing, like going for a walk or watching a movie.”</li>
            <li>“Let’s plan&nbsp;how to celebrate after you’ve been smokefree for a month.”</li>
            <li>“If you find yourself reaching for a cigarette, you can call me instead.”</li>
           </ul> 
          </div> 
          <div id="content_resourceLinks"> 
           <div class="resource-links clearfix"> 
            <p class="last-updated"> <strong>Content last updated on:</strong> February 26, 2019 </p> 
            <p class="source-links"> <a id="content_contentReviewLink" href="/HealthTopics/Sources.aspx#40t"> Reviewer Information </a> </p> 
           </div> 
          </div> 
         </div> 
         <!-- ./quickguide_tool_content --> 
        </div> 
       </div>
